</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 163 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When opening the book, whispers can be heard on the wind, or laughter rings in the distance.
